value:
$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|And now...you will be my vessel.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Gah!$k$p...Grr-rahh!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Z-Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face|Ngya— Ahh...
$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Give up. You cannot possibly
hope to resist me.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no! Th-this is— I'm at a loss
for words!$k$pHe has been taken by Embla...$k$pNo mortal could possibly defend
against such power!$k$pWithout the direct aid of Lord Askr
himself, this cannot be undone...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... Askr will not come
here... He cannot come here.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|This realm is under my control...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Askr stepping foot here would only
end with him sinking, mired, drowning
in the dark...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|He knows better.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|He is pathetic... He cares nothing
for you. He will abandon you here.
He already has.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I-I must object, a-and request you
retract that slanderous claim!$k$p$EFace_Cool|Lord Askr is very caring! He granted
his power to the mortals for the sake
of maintaining peace, and-and—$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... So cry out to him.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Plead for him come here, to die
for you...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That...I...$k$p

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face|$c255,0,0,255|Kill...Askr... I will kill Askr...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Prince Alfonse, stop! If you fight him,
he may—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|We have to stop him without killing
him... That is our only option.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Nevertheless...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_08,0|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face|$c255,0,0,255|Not...done yet. Askr...must die.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|I will not stop. Not until this body
lies in ruin, or Askr does...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Embla's grip on him is getting
stronger...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|If that's true...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... Yes? What are you
thinking over there? Let me guess.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Thinking of running away? You hope
to buy yourself time to find a way
to defeat me, I imagine...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|As I said before, give up. You have
no way forward. All paths lie dark
before you. Your choice: fight or die.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Embla...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... Askr...must die.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|But he will not come to save you!
And when he does not, you will
grow to hate him... You will—$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$Sbs3000|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Hmm?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Enemy,Face_Pain|$c255,0,0,255|N-no!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$Sbs150|

$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Guh...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Embla's spirit has...left my brother.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|Unthinkable. You actually came,
Askr... To die in the dark... Knowing
full well...$k$p$EFace_Pain|How false you are, appearing
here, now...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Cool|I will not allow mortals to suffer
such calamity, Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face|Hmph... Fine. I will simply leave you
here to dissolve into the darkness.
You will be dead soon enough.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I will be sure to be here to watch
as the darkness saps the last of your
strength from you...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias! Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Forgive me...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Embla is gone now... She is not likely
to return for some time.$k$p$EFace_Anger|However, I must also go. As she
said, I can be here only briefly.$k$pI am not at my full strength,
here in this darkness.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Lord Askr... I owe you a sincere
apology. I failed you. I have caused
you nothing but trouble. Truly—$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Do not worry, Ash. You did good.
I am proud of you.$k$pAnd you all must be the children
who inherited my blood.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Y-yes...Lord Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|I am so happy to finally meet you!
I am pleased to be looking on your
faces now.$k$pYes... I see the resemblance to Líf.$k$pLíf was your ancestor, of course.
Or did you know that already?$k$p$EFace_Cool2|You look to me now like he did
on the first day we met. I was
napping in a field when...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Er, I beg your pardon, Lord Askr.
Though it may be presumptuous
of me to say so, there are more—$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes. I'm sorry, Ash. You are right.
It has been such a long time since
I spoke with mortals, I forgot myself!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Lord Askr is...not quite as I imagined
he would be...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|But he's nice and friendly, at least!$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|We will talk as we move. Follow me.$k$p$EFace_Smile|To counter Embla, Askr is needed.
I will show you my realm, my home,
and we will regroup there.$k$p$Sbs150|
